thread.title: Rajinikanth treats Twitter fans with ‘Kabali’ first look
thread.title_full: Rajinikanth treats Twitter fans with ‘Kabali’ first look | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Rajinikanth treats Twitter fans with ‘Kabali’ first look
text:
Other Articles Scribe's question on my sexuality was humiliating: Tom Hardy Beyonce should be covered up: Louis Farrakhan tells Jay Z 'Star Trek Beyond' release delayed by two weeks Rajinikanth just treated his Twitter fans with something special as he posted the first look of his 159th Tamil drama ‘Kabali’ opposite Radhika Apte on the social networking site.
The 64-year-old Rajinikanth, who plays mafia don in the film, is seen sitting on a couch in a grey suit in one poster, while the other shows the actor single-handedly fighting a bunch of goons with a chain.
Directed by Pa Ranjith, the flick which is based on the real life story of Chennai mafia, also stars Dhansikaa, Kalaiarasan, Prakash Raj and Gajaraj.
First Published on September 17, 2015 6:30 pm
